abstract: Diet hard--Milly Liar--Secrets and wives--Apocalypse wow!
description: Episode number 9 of Series "This life". 'Diet hard' (dir. Joe Ahearne, wri. William Gaminara): Ironically, Milly suspects Egg is having an affair with Nicki. The cafe has a disappointing opening night, as is Anna's first AA meeting. Ferdy freaks out after meeting Lenny's family, leading him into a heterosexual encounter and a fight with Miles. 'Milly Liar' (dir. Morag Fullerton, wri. Joe Ahearne): Miles refuses to apologise to Ferdy. Milly loses her watch in O'Donnells office and panics. Miles is upset at Francesca's plans for a pre-nuptial agreement and seeks Anna's advice, who is also advising Francesca on whether she should reveal her true age to Miles. Anna confronts Milly about her infidelity. 'Secrets and wives' (dir. Morag Fullarton, wri. Richard Zajdlic): Ferdy and Lenny patch things up and Francesca confesses to Miles. Miles has his stag night with Anna an honorary member and makes her an offer she can't refuse, or can she? Milly catches O'Donnell with his wife. 'Apocalypse wow!' (dir. Morag Fullarton, wri. Richard Zajdlic ): In this concluding episode Milly confront O'Donnell and makes peace with Anna. Miles and Francesca's wedding day approaches and there's tears, laughter, passion, declarations of love, a proposal, a brawl and a surprise visitor. Cast includes Jack Davenport, Daniella Nardini, Amita Dhiri, Jason Hughes, Andrew Lincoln and Ramon Tikaram.
